rooms.function: Entrance and reception area with Vastu orientation (north or east facing).
Open-plan living area combining kitchen, dining, and social space. Designed with Mediterranean aesthetics; large windows for natural light.
Dedicated space for formal dining, aligned with the living area.
Dedicated home office space with a quiet corner and proper lighting per Vastu recommendations (eastern side).
Open-plan kitchen integrated into living area with Mediterranean styling; functional layout.
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and attached balcony (south-east for Vastu positive energy).
Secondary bedroom with north or east exposure following Vastu principles.
Third bedroom located in a quiet corner for meditation or guest usage; Vastu compliant.
En-suite bathroom integrated into master bedroom; designed with functional layout and sufficient ventilation.
Additional guest bathroom located adjacent to living area.
Entertainment room with soundproofing and ambient lighting; positioned away from the main living areas for minimal disturbance.
